text: Lydia McLaughlin returns to ` ` The Real Housewives of Orange County'' after leaving the show in 2013. Tommy Garcia / Bravo Lydia McLaughlin says that the time was right for her to return to Bravo's ` ` The Real Housewives of Orange County.'' ` ` It was actually really hard to decide to leave,'' McLaughlin told INSIDER of quitting the show after just one season in 2013. ` ` I think a lot of people thought I was crazy. One of the producers actually said,'It's lightning in a bottle and it doesn't happen twice,'because I told them maybe I'll just take a break.
